template.name: Patricia
template.description: Base with color and font changes
template.notes:
Base color: ac00df ~ violet Base left : 1500f8 ~ blue Base right: f07 ~ purplish red Complement: ebff00 ~ greenish yellow Extra: c06 ~ shade of purplish red
Fonts: • Body: Noto Serif • Table cells: Arsenal, Fira Sans Extra Condensed • Fixed width: Space Mono • Headings: Nunito • Footer, sidebar: Firas Sans Condensed
template.tags: responsive, facebook clone, wordpress clone, mobile, desktop, multpile columns
